description: Implementation Mechanisms of the Strategic Development Plan of Southern Egypt

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
The “Implementation Mechanisms of the Strategic Development Plan of Southern Egypt” focuses on strengthening local administrations and building capacities on planning for sustainable human settlements, especially in strategic planning and community-based planning. The outputs of the project are as follows:
- Urban development process within Egyptian villages improved
- Living conditions within informal settlements improved by adopting participatory upgrading planning
- National and local monitoring systems in place
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Imp. of Plan of Southern Egypt
